document_data.name: Baldurian Seafood Stew
document_data.mainbody: '''Baldurian seafood stew''' was a signature dish from the harbors of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Description: A hearty and versatile [[stew]], these dishes exuded fragrance of [[garlic]], fried [[tomato]] paste, and usually consisted of a wide variety of day's catch seafood. Common versions were filled with [[clam]]s, [[prawn]]s, [[fish]], and [[peas]].
document_data.Availability: Created by the busy bustling inhabitants of Baldur's Gate's harbors, this recipe became a staple on the city by the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]], and even served in the [[Western Heartlands]].
